title: League website problems

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic, tagged with and ; uploaded by Roguestoney. League website using mobile

body:
It's been like this for a while now. Made a post about it when it first happened but there were too many other issues at that time with regards to new queues being released and new ranked season. 

I'm unable to use the news section on mobile as it zooms to what you see in the linked image and I'm not able to change the zoom. So i can only read parts of the information and i cant even get to page 2 of the news section. 

Hopefully this is not a large issue to resolve.
